name: HCV-GLUE
tagline: A GLUE project for Hepatitis C virus
body:
### **HCV-GLUE**

This is the project page for HCV-GLUE, a GLUE project for Hepatitis C virus (HCV).

### **GLUE**

GLUE is a software package for developing nucleotide-level evolutionary hypotheses for virus and endogenous viral element (EVE) genomes. It enables the dissemination of these hypotheses on the web and the utilisation of the hypotheses in wider software systems. 

### **Included in the HCV-GLUE project**

This GLUE project includes the GLUE framework implementation of a [web-accessible HCV analysis tool](http://gluehome.cvr.gla.ac.uk/gluetools-web/www/hcvApp.html#/submitSequencesAnalysis).

### **Authors and Contributors**

Josh Singer (josh.singer@glasgow.ac.uk)

Robert J. Gifford (robert.gifford@glasgow.ac.uk).

John McLauchlan

Emma Thomson
